features: SDK usage for queries, sessions, batch, advanced reasoning
MCP server integration for Claude Desktop and custom tools
notes: Electron SDK modules must provide the same API as documented for agent integration.
WebSocket client/server logic must be ported and tested in Electron.
MCP server and tool integration must be validated for Electron context.
Authentication flows must be supported and documented for Electron.
Troubleshooting steps must be updated for Electron deployment.
electronIntegration: electron/sdk: SDK modules and client logic
electron/features/apiServer: API endpoints for agent integration
